p: FigureÂ 1 displays the operando photoelectron microspectroscopy system for the all solid-state LIBs. A photoelectron map could be obtained by scanning a soft X-ray beam focused on a sample using a Fresnel zone plate (FZP) and detecting the photoelectrons at each beam spot. An operando cell for the all solid-state LIBs was prepared for photoelectron microspectroscopy in a high vacuum chamber.
